browsermonkey.render
Class TagRenderer

java.lang.Object
  browsermonkey.render.TagRenderer
Direct Known Subclasses:
InvisibleTagRenderer, TransparentTagRenderer
public abstract class TagRenderer
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a base for TagRenderers that render TagDocumentNodes into RenderNodes.

public abstract void render(Renderer renderer,
                            TagDocumentNode tag,
                            LayoutRenderNode parent,
                            java.util.Map<java.text.AttributedCharacterIterator.Attribute,java.lang.Object> formatting)
Renders the given tag into the parent, taking into account the current formatting. Uses the given renderer for utility methods and rendering children.
